item.title: Deploy Native Camel Quarkus Routes To Azure Kubernetes Cluster With Knative
item.description: In this blog, we will take a close look on how we can deploy Camel Quarkus routes compiled natively using GraalVM Native Image generator on Azure Kubernetes cluster with Knative installed. But first, we will give a brief overview about Camel, Camel Quarkus, Knative and GraalVM Native Image. Â Overview Apache Camel is a swiss knife integration engine that can be used to integrate between different components within the system using Enterprise Integration Patterns.
